019package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder;
020
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.getNMTokenValidator;
025
026import java.net.URI;
027import java.net.URISyntaxException;
028import java.time.Instant;
029import java.time.LocalDate;
030import java.time.LocalDateTime;
031import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
032import java.util.Optional;
033
034import org.apiguardian.api.API;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.internal.XMLDocumentImpl;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.Document;
038
039/**
040 *  The definition for an XML document.
041 *
042 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
043 *  @version $Id: XMLDocument.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
044 *  @since 0.0.5
045 *
046 *  @UMLGraph.link
047 */
048@SuppressWarnings( {"ClassWithTooManyMethods", "preview"} )
049@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: XMLDocument.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
050@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
051public sealed interface XMLDocument extends Document<XMLElement>
052    permits XMLDocumentImpl
053{
054        /*-----------*\
055    ====** Constants **========================================================
056        \*-----------*/
057    /**
058     *  An empty array of {@code XMLDocument} objects.
059     */
060    public static final XMLDocument [] EMPTY_XMDocument_ARRAY = new XMLDocument [0];
061
062        /*---------*\
063    ====** Methods **==========================================================
064        \*---------*/
065    /**
066     *  Adds a child to the root element of this document.
067     *
068     *  @param  child    The child to add.
069     *  @return This instance.
070     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The child is not allowed for the
071     *      root element of this document, or the root element does not allow
072     *      to add children at all.
073     *  @throws IllegalStateException   The child has already a parent that is
074     *      not the root XML element.
075     */
076    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
077    public default XMLDocument addChild( final XMLElement child ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
078    {
079        getRootElement().addChild( child );
080
081        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
082        return this;
083    }   //  addChild()
084
085    /**
086     *  Adds a comment to the root element of this document.
087     *
088     *  @param  comment The comment to add.
089     *  @return This instance.
090     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The root element does not allow to
091     *      add comments.
092     */
093    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
094    public default XMLDocument addComment( final CharSequence comment ) throws IllegalArgumentException
095    {
096        getRootElement().addComment( comment );
097
098        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
099        return this;
100    }   //  //  addComment()
101
102    /**
103     *  Adds a comment to the document itself.
104     *
105     *  @param  comment The comment to add.
106     *  @return This instance.
107     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The document does not allow to
108     *      add comments.
109     */
110    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
111    public default XMLDocument addDocumentComment( final CharSequence comment ) throws IllegalArgumentException
112    {
113        throw new IllegalArgumentException( "No comment allowed for this document" );
114    }   //  addDocumentComment()
115
116    /**
117     *  Adds predefined XML markup to the root element of this document. The
118     *  given markup will not be validated, it just may not be {@code null}. So
119     *  the caller is responsible that it will be proper XML.<br>
120     *  <br>As the markup may be formatted differently (or not formatted at
121     *  all), the pretty printed output may be distorted when this is used.
122     *
123     *  @param  markup  The XML markup.
124     *  @return This instance.
125     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The root element does not allow to
126     *      add children at all.
127     */
128    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
129    public default XMLDocument addPredefinedMarkup( final CharSequence markup ) throws IllegalArgumentException
130    {
131        getRootElement().addPredefinedMarkup( markup );
132
133        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
134        return this;
135    }   //  addPredefinedMarkup()
136
137    /**
138     *  Adds a processing instruction to this document.
139     *
140     *  @param  processingInstruction   The procession instruction to add.
141     *  @return This instance.
142     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    This document does not allow to add
143     *      processing instructions.
144     *  @throws IllegalStateException   The processing instruction has already
145     *      a parent.
146     */
147    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
148    public default XMLDocument addProcessingInstruction( final ProcessingInstruction processingInstruction ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
149    {
150        throw new IllegalArgumentException( "No processing instructions allowed for this document" );
151    }   //  addProcessingInstruction()
152
153    /**
154     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
155     *  document.<br>
156     *  <br>The method uses
157     *  {@link Boolean#toString(boolean)}
158     *  to convert the provided flag to a {@code String}.
159     *
160     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
161     *  @param  flag    The attribute's value.
162     *  @return This instance.
163     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
164     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
165     *      all.
166     */
167    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final boolean flag ) throws IllegalArgumentException
168    {
169        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, flag );
170
171        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
172        return this;
173    }   //  setAttribute()
174
175    /**
176     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
177     *  document.<br>
178     *  <br>The method uses
179     *  {@link Boolean#toString()}
180     *  to convert the provided flag to a {@code String}.
181     *
182     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
183     *  @param  flag    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
184     *      attribute will be removed.
185     *  @return This instance.
186     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
187     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
188     *      all.
189     */
190    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final Boolean flag ) throws IllegalArgumentException
191    {
192        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, flag );
193
194        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
195        return this;
196    }   //  setAttribute()
197
198    /**
199     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
200     *  document.
201     *
202     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
203     *  @param  value   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
204     *      attribute will be removed.
205     *  @return This instance.
206     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
207     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
208     *      all.
209     */
210    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value ) throws IllegalArgumentException
211    {
212        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, value );
213
214        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
215        return this;
216    }   //  setAttribute()
217
218    /**
219     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
220     *  document.
221     *
222     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
223     *  @param  value   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
224     *      attribute will be removed.
225     *  @param  append  If not
226     *      {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}, the new value will be appended
227     *      on an already existing one, and this sequence is used as the
228     *      separator.
229     *  @return This instance.
230     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
231     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
232     *      all.
233     */
234    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
235    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> append ) throws IllegalArgumentException
236    {
237        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, value, append );
238
239        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
240        return this;
241    }   //  setAttribute()
242
243    /**
244     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
245     *  document.<br>
246     *  <br>The method uses
247     *  {@link Double#toString(double)}
248     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
249     *
250     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
251     *  @param  number   The attribute's value.
252     *  @return This instance.
253     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
254     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
255     *      all.
256     */
257    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final double number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
258    {
259        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, number );
260
261        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
262        return this;
263    }   //  setAttribute()
264
265    /**
266     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
267     *  document.<br>
268     *  <br>The method uses
269     *  {@link Enum#name()}
270     *  to convert the provided value to a {@code String}.
271     *
272     *  @param  <E> The concrete enum type of {@code value}.
273     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
274     *  @param  enumValue   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
275     *      attribute will be removed.
276     *  @return This instance.
277     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
278     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
279     *      all.
280     */
281    public default <E extends Enum<E>> XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final E enumValue ) throws IllegalArgumentException
282    {
283        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, enumValue );
284
285        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
286        return this;
287    }   //  setAttribute()
288
289    /**
290     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
291     *  document.<br>
292     *  <br>The method uses
293     *  {@link Instant#toString()}
294     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
295     *
296     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
297     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
298     *      attribute will be removed.
299     *  @return This instance.
300     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
301     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
302     *      all.
303     */
304    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final Instant date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
305    {
306        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, date );
307
308        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
309        return this;
310    }   //  setAttribute()
311
312    /**
313     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
314     *  document.<br>
315     *  <br>The method uses
316     *  {@link Integer#toString(int)}
317     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
318     *
319     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
320     *  @param  number  The attribute's value.
321     *  @return This instance.
322     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
323     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
324     *      all.
325     */
326    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final int number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
327    {
328        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, number );
329
330        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
331        return this;
332    }   //  setAttribute()
333
334    /**
335     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
336     *  document.<br>
337     *  <br>The method uses
338     *  {@link LocalDate#toString()}
339     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
340     *
341     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
342     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
343     *      attribute will be removed.
344     *  @return This instance.
345     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
346     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
347     *      all.
348     */
349    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final LocalDate date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
350    {
351        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, date );
352
353        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
354        return this;
355    }   //  setAttribute()
356
357    /**
358     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
359     *  document.<br>
360     *  <br>The method uses
361     *  {@link LocalDateTime#toString()}
362     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
363     *
364     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
365     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
366     *      attribute will be removed.
367     *  @return This instance.
368     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
369     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
370     *      all.
371     */
372    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final LocalDateTime date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
373    {
374        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, date );
375
376        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
377        return this;
378    }   //  setAttribute()
379
380    /**
381     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
382     *  document.<br>
383     *  <br>The method uses
384     *  {@link Long#toString(long)}
385     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
386     *
387     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
388     *  @param  number   The attribute's value.
389     *  @return This instance.
390     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
391     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
392     *      all.
393     */
394    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final long number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
395    {
396        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, number );
397
398        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
399        return this;
400    }   //  setAttribute()
401
402    /**
403     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
404     *  document.<br>
405     *  <br>The method uses
406     *  {@link Number#toString()}
407     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
408     *
409     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
410     *  @param  number   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
411     *      attribute will be removed.
412     *  @return This instance.
413     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
414     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
415     *      all.
416     */
417    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final Number number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
418    {
419        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, number );
420
421        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
422        return this;
423    }   //  setAttribute()
424
425    /**
426     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
427     *  document.<br>
428     *  <br>The method uses
429     *  {@link ZonedDateTime#toString()}
430     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
431     *
432     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case sensitive.
433     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
434     *      attribute will be removed.
435     *  @return This instance.
436     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
437     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
438     *      all.
439     */
440    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final ZonedDateTime date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
441    {
442        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, date );
443
444        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
445        return this;
446    }   //  setAttribute()
447
448    /**
449     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
450     *  document if the provided value is not empty.<br>
451     *  <br>The method uses
452     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils#isNotEmpty(CharSequence)}
453     *  to test if the given value is empty.
454     *
455     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute.
456     *  @param  value   The value for the attribute; can be {@code null}.
457     *  @return This instance.
458     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
459     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
460     *      all.
461     */
462    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
463    public default XMLDocument setAttributeIfNotEmpty( final String name, final CharSequence value ) throws IllegalArgumentException
464    {
465        getRootElement().setAttributeIfNotEmpty( name, value );
466
467        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
468        return this;
469    }   //  setAttributeIfNotEmpty()
470
471    /**
472     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
473     *  document if the provided value is not empty.
474     *
475     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute.
476     *  @param  optional   The value for the attribute.
477     *  @return This instance.
478     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
479     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
480     *      all.
481     */
482    @SuppressWarnings( {"UnusedReturnValue", "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType"} )
483    public default XMLDocument setAttributeIfNotEmpty( final String name, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> optional ) throws IllegalArgumentException
484    {
485        getRootElement().setAttributeIfNotEmpty( name, optional );
486
487        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
488        return this;
489    }   //  setAttributeIfNotEmpty()
490
491    /**
492     *  Sets the id for the root element of this document.<br>
493     *  <br>The value will be validated using the method that is provided by a
494     *  call to
495     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getNMTokenValidator()}.
496     *
497     *  @param  id  The id.
498     *  @return This instance.
499     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
500     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
501     *      all.
502     *
503     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#XMLATTRIBUTE_Id
504     */
505    public default XMLDocument setId( final String id ) throws IllegalArgumentException
506    {
507        if( !getNMTokenValidator().test( requireNotEmptyArgument( id, "id" ) ) ) throw new IllegalArgumentException( format( "Invalid id: %s", id ) );
508        getRootElement().setId( id );
509
510        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
511        return this;
512    }   //  setId()
513
514    /**
515     *  Sets the given namespace to the root element of this document.
516     *
517     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
518     *  @return This instance.
519     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
520     *      element.
521     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
522     */
523    public default XMLDocument setNamespace( final String identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException, URISyntaxException
524    {
525        getRootElement().setNamespace( new Namespace( identifier ) );
526
527        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
528        return this;
529    }   //  setNamespace()
530
531    /**
532     *  Sets the given namespace to the root element of this document.
533     *
534     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
535     *  @return This instance.
536     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
537     *      element.
538     */
539    public default XMLDocument setNamespace( final URI identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException
540    {
541        getRootElement().setNamespace( new Namespace( identifier ) );
542
543        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
544        return this;
545    }   //  setNamespace()
546
547    /**
548     *  Sets the given namespace to the root element of this document.<br>
549     *  <br>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
550     *  provided by
551     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.
552     *
553     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
554     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
555     *  @return This instance.
556     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
557     *      element.
558     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
559     */
560    public default XMLDocument setNamespace( final String prefix, final String identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException, URISyntaxException
561    {
562        getRootElement().setNamespace( new Namespace( prefix, identifier ) );
563
564        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
565        return this;
566    }   //  setNamespace()
567
568    /**
569     *  Sets the given namespace to the root element of this document.<br>
570     *  <br>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
571     *  provided by
572     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.
573     *
574     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
575     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
576     *  @return This instance.
577     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
578     *      element.
579     */
580    public default XMLDocument setNamespace( final String prefix, final URI identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException
581    {
582        getRootElement().setNamespace( new Namespace( prefix, identifier ) );
583
584        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
585        return this;
586    }   //  setNamespace()
587
588    /**
589     *  Sets the given namespace to the root element of this document.
590     *
591     *  @param  namespace   The namespace.
592     *  @return This instance.
593     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
594     *      element.
595     */
596    public default XMLDocument setNamespace( final Namespace namespace ) throws IllegalArgumentException
597    {
598        getRootElement().setNamespace( namespace );
599
600        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
601        return this;
602    }   //  setNamespace()
603}
604//  interface XMLDocument
605
606/*
607 *  End of File
608 */
